title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 835.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 835.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to the review, hearing and decision
of objections and issues arising as a result of administrative actions and
decisions taken or rendered by the executive director under the basin
regulations. Any hearing shall be conducted pursuant to the provisions of Part
836 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
835.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
